document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of the Sutherlane and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Sutherlane
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sutherlane''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Sutherlane was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] and [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It originated in the Sea Ward in the north on [[Darselune Street]] and [[Feather Street]] where it branched southeast toward the [[Market (Waterdeep)|Market]]. The Sutherlane crossed into the Castle Ward at [[Julthoon Street]] and continued before ending at [[Trader's Way (Waterdeep)|Trader's Way]] just northwest of the Market. Other streets connecting with the Sutherlane included [[Whim Street]], [[Zarimtar Street]], [[Haltovar Street]], and [[Runer's Alley]].
